rptData.sql: select x.mc,x.wdly,e.mc fldname,x.newval,x.oldval,x.rkrq,s.mc szbm,se,c.mc czfpbm from ( select d.mc,'地税' wdly,m.fldname,m.newval,m.oldval,r.rkrq,r.szbm,r.se,r.czfpbm from dj_cz d,rtk r,hd_zsmx m where r.p_id=m.p_id and r.rkrq=m.rkrq and r.wdly=m.wdly and r.key=m.key and m.wdly=0 and d.qynm=m.p_id and m.hid={hid} union all select d.mc,'国税' wdly,m.fldname,m.newval,m.oldval,r.rkrq,r.szbm,r.se,r.czfpbm from dj_cz d,rtk r,hd_zsmx m where r.p_id=m.p_id and r.rkrq=m.rkrq and r.wdly=m.wdly and r.key=m.key and m.wdly=1 and d.dzdah=m.p_id and m.hid={hid} ) x, EN_DICTIONARY e, ( select bm,mc from bm_cont where table_bm='BM_SZ' ) s, ( select bm,mc from bm_cont where table_bm='BM_CZFP' ) c where x.szbm=s.bm(+) and x.czfpbm=c.bm(+) and upper(x.fldname)=e.field(+) order by x.rkrq,x.szbm
